amendment.description: To enhance authority relating to the waiver of claims for overpayment of pay and allowances of members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4506 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4506 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6352) To enhance authority relating to the waiver of claims for overpayment of pay and allowances of members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4506 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4506 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.
